#All about Sonus

= What is Sonus? =

Sonus is an [http://wiki.xmms2.xmms.se/index.php/Main_Page xmms2] client written in Python with PyQt4.

Sonus is intended to be very simple and minimalistic while still being very powerful and functional.


= What can Sonus do? =

You can see a list of planned and completed features on the [Features] page.

= How can I help? =

You can help by testing Sonus and providing feedback and patches. Feel free to open an issue and make a feature request or a bug report.
